title: East India Cotton association Prices -September 27 2019

East India Cotton association Prices -September 27 2019

Commodities 27 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 21:40)

© Reuters. East India Cotton association Prices -September 27 2019 BANGALORE, September 27 (Reuters) - The following are the daily Cotton prices supplied by Indian based East India Cotton Association. The prices are in Indian Rupees per Candy (355.62 Kgs).
